title: JAN AND KATRINA
content: Jan and Katrina are Dutch children. They live in a little blue house. Their house is near a big, brown windmill. The roof of their house is made of red tile. Near the chimney is a big stork’s nest. It is made of sticks and straw. Jan and Katrina like to watch the storks.

book.title: Windmills and wooden shoes
book.description: 简介： In Windmills and Wooden Shoes we have a continuous story of the doings of the Dutch children, Jan and Katrina and their little friends....
